item.title: Diseño Digital - Diseño Computacional
item.author: info@dimensionn.mx (Jamagax)
item.description: Reintegramos nuestro Blog en MarkDown y Static Site. Hola It’s a fast and static website generator written in the Go language. Websites built with Hugo can be hosted anywhere from GitHub Pages to Amazon S3 without any database or other language dependencies. First I started to use Hugo is for my Malayalam write up a blog wizbi tales (Malayalam is a language spoken in Kerala, India), After the initial learning curves, I loved it for simplicity and performance.

item.title: Note 1
item.author: info@dimensionn.mx (Jamagax)
item.description: Journaling is not just a little thing you do to pass the time, to write down your memories—though it can be—it’s a strategy that has helped brilliant, powerful and wise people become better at what they do.
